div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 619 Troianul (formerly Belitori), 92 km. SW of Bucharest, 1943 Burial: c. 100 B.C.? (Mitrea) Contents: 430 AR Dyrrhachium: dr. incl. imit. Disposition: Bucharest (Inst. Arch.) Nestor, Raport asupra activit. Muzeului National de antichiati (Bucharest, 1944), pp. 57-60
